Question
========

You throw up 2 Euros. We define the event *A* as: at least one cup lies on top. What then is the probability of event *A*?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/4
* 2/4
* 3/4
* 1/2

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/4: Incorrect
* 2/4: Incorrect
* 3/4: Correct
* 1/2: Incorrect
